name: 2PLAY
description: A playlist making app for you and your copilot, powered by Spotify, and built using mySQL, Handlebars, jQuery, Express, and Node.js.

name: Juniper's Weather
description: Get your weather information from a child in a web app featuring drawings by Juniper. Built with the AllWeather API and jQuery, and utilizing Local Storage.

name: Code Quiz
description: Test your coding knowledge with this quick coding quiz covering elements from HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Check your high score on the leaderboard.

name: JavaScript Hangman
description: Welcome to the wild wild west, where justice is decided by a bizarre game of hangman from the future.

name: Bob's Burgers Burger Eater
description: Devour, regurgitate, and create your own burgers in the Bob's Burgers inspired exercise using Handlebars and mySQL.

name: Dayplanner
description: Keep track of your daily appointments in style, utilizing local storage in your browser.

name: FFXIV Mounts
description: Browse, sort, and view your favorite FFXIV Mounts in this simple React application, click on any mount to obtain more information.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Workout logging is hard, but not with this app utilizing mongoDB and Mongoose to store, retrieve, and compile results.

name: Offline Budget Tracker
description: No need to sweat your budget when travelling, this handy app works on or offline using indexDB to provide peace of mind.

name: Coming Out of Quarantine
description: Everyone will need a drink coming out of quarantine, using jQuery, this app will lead you to the nearest watering hole or taco truck with the MapBox and Zomato API's.
